definition: also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Brennan said it has long been an area of concern.
sentences.chinese: 布倫南說，也門早已成爲引人關注的地區。

sentences.english: Yemen is a testing ground for the “scalpel” approach Mr. Brennan endorses.
sentences.chinese: 也門是布瑞南先生提倡的“手術刀式打擊”的檢驗場。

sentences.english: Yemen began cooperating with the United States on counterterrorism activities in late 2001.
sentences.chinese: 從零一年起也門就和美國在反恐行動上進行合作。

sentences.english: Separately, two Chinese employees were held in Yemen. Please tell us more details.
sentences.chinese: 另外，有兩名中方人員在也門被扣，請介紹有關情況。

sentences.english: Protest-related violence across Yemen has killed more than 120 people since the backlash began earlier this year.
sentences.chinese: 也門全國各地都有跟抗議有關的暴力事件發生。

sentences.english: The attacks are in support of the Yemeni government as it battles against a group of rebels called Houthis.
sentences.chinese: 一系列襲擊是爲了支持也門政府對抗胡塞叛軍。

sentences.english: How is it that the spark of revolution still managed to jump to Yemen?
sentences.chinese: 那爲什麼革命的火花仍然躍入了也門呢？

sentences.english: Demonstrators also have denounced what they say is systematic oppression and widespread corruption.
sentences.chinese: 示威者譴責也門有組織的壓迫和普遍的腐敗問題。

sentences.english: The Houthis have taken control of parts of Yemen.
sentences.chinese: 胡塞叛軍已經控制了也門部分地區。

sentences.english: Yemens aviation authority says it is tightening security at all of its airports.
sentences.chinese: 也門航空管理局說，它加強了所有機場的安全防範。

sentences.english: Yemen is a republic with a bicameral legislature.
sentences.chinese: 也門是採用兩院制立法機構的共和國。

sentences.english: The German deputy ambassador to Yemen applauded the resolution of the incident.
sentences.chinese: 德國駐也門副大使對事件的解決很滿意。

sentences.english: The Ministry of the Interior proceeded to demand the arrest of 55 prominent Houthi figures.
sentences.chinese: 也門政府內政部繼續通緝55名胡西領導人。

sentences.english: All are elements of long-term plans for Yemen.
sentences.chinese: 這些全部都是也門長遠規劃的不可或缺的因素。

sentences.english: Al-Raimi escaped from a Yemeni prison in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 雷米2006年逃離了也門的一個監獄。

pinyin: Sha1 wu1 di4 A1 la1 bo2

definition: Sudan/sultan (ruler of some Muslim states, esp. Ottoman Emperor)

pinyin: Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3
A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2
